snippet: Lawyers suing the N.C.A.A. over its handling of head injuries asked a federal judge to let them expand the lawsuit nationwide to include thousands of plaintiffs.
abstract: Lawyers suing NCAA over its handling of head injuries ask federal judge to let them expand lawsuit nationwide to include thousands of plaintiffs in case they contend could change college sports; other college athletics news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers suing the N.C.A.A. over its handling of head injuries asked a federal judge to let them expand the lawsuit nationwide to include thousands of plaintiffs.

headline.main: Lawyers Seek to Expand Concussion Lawsuit Against N.C.A.A.
